stories.Title: Enhancing the auto industry
stories.Description: Nvidia and Foxconn are expanding their partnership with the creation of AI factories. These facilities aim to improve and update AI software for a more seamless, autonomous driving experience.
stories.Tweet: Enhancing the auto industry 📦 Nvidia and Foxconn are expanding their partnership with the creation of AI factories. These facilities aim to improve and update AI software for a more seamless, autonomous driving experience. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/17/foxconn-and-nvidia-are-building-ai-factories-to-accelerate-self-driving-cars/

stories.Title: New standards in AI
stories.Description: Baidu's ERNIE 4.0, matching the best in the industry, is set to take the AI world by storm with its upgraded multimodal capabilities and interactive chat interface, enhancing the user experience.
stories.Tweet: New standards in AI 📦 Baidu's ERNIE 4.0, matching the best in the industry, is set to take the AI world by storm with its upgraded multimodal capabilities and interactive chat interface, enhancing the user experience. #ai https://www.engadget.com/baidus-ceo-says-its-ernie-ai-is-not-inferior-in-any-aspect-to-gpt-4-162333722.html

stories.Title: A bit of beta dynamics
stories.Description: Change is in the air at OpenAI! Browse with Bing has made its official debut for ChatGPT users. Simultaneously, DALL-E 3 enters beta, inviting testing of its impressive capabilities.
stories.Tweet: A bit of beta dynamics 📦 Change is in the air at OpenAI! Browse with Bing has made its official debut for ChatGPT users. Simultaneously, DALL-E 3 enters beta, inviting testing of its impressive capabilities. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/18/openai-formally-brings-bing-powered-search-to-chatgpt-as-dall-e-3-arrives-in-beta/

stories.Title: An exciting encounter
stories.Description: Lucy, NASA's asteroid mission, is getting closer to its first destination, Dinikinesh. The spacecraft has been tracking the asteroid's brightness as it prepares for its big rendezvous on November 1.
stories.Tweet: An exciting encounter 📦 Lucy, NASA's asteroid mission, is getting closer to its first destination, Dinikinesh. The spacecraft has been tracking the asteroid's brightness as it prepares for its big rendezvous on November 1. #space https://gizmodo.com/nasa-lucy-probe-jupiter-trojans-dinkinesh-trajectory-1850934978

stories.Title: The potential of wearable tech
stories.Description: Early intervention is key to the management of Parkinson's disease. Oxford's study highlights the power of wearables and machine learning in improving diagnostics and future treatment options.
stories.Tweet: The potential of wearable tech 📦 Early intervention is key to the management of Parkinson's disease. Oxford's study highlights the power of wearables and machine learning in improving diagnostics and future treatment options. #science https://www.engadget.com/study-wearable-sensors-more-accurately-track-parkinsons-disease-progression-than-traditional-observation-171132495.html

stories.Title: Eyes on the road
stories.Description: In response to user concerns, Tesla has introduced the "Driver Drowsiness Warning." This feature uses the cabin camera not only to monitor driver attention but also to identify signs of drowsiness.
stories.Tweet: Eyes on the road 📦 In response to user concerns, Tesla has introduced the "Driver Drowsiness Warning." This feature uses the cabin camera not only to monitor driver attention but also to identify signs of drowsiness. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/10/17/tesla-rolls-out-driver-drowsiness-warning-leveraging-cabin-camera/

stories.Title: Embracing the EV revolution
stories.Description: Citroen is keeping up with the times by releasing the new e-C3, which is designed to meet the demand for affordable EVs in Europe. The competition is fierce.
stories.Tweet: Embracing the EV revolution 📦 Citroen is keeping up with the times by releasing the new e-C3, which is designed to meet the demand for affordable EVs in Europe. The competition is fierce. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/10/17/stellantis-unveils-affordable-electric-citroen-c3-25k/

stories.Title: NACS welcomes BMW
stories.Description: Another automaker is joining the NACS club, and this time it's BMW. They're planning to incorporate Tesla's EV charging standard into their future EVs by 2025.
stories.Tweet: NACS welcomes BMW 📦 Another automaker is joining the NACS club, and this time it's BMW. They're planning to incorporate Tesla's EV charging standard into their future EVs by 2025. #tesla https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/17/23921374/bmw-mini-rolls-royce-tesla-nacs-ev-charging-standard

stories.Title: Adapting to change
stories.Description: MacBooks might be losing some of their sparkle. Ming-Chi Kuo's analysis foresees a 30% decline in shipments in 2023, reflecting changes in consumer preferences.
stories.Tweet: Adapting to change 📦 MacBooks might be losing some of their sparkle. Ming-Chi Kuo's analysis foresees a 30% decline in shipments in 2023, reflecting changes in consumer preferences. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2023/10/18/top-apple-analyst-says-macbook-demand-has-fallen-significantly.html

stories.Title: Good news for iPhone users!
stories.Description: Apple's iOS 17.1 (Release Candidate) addresses user-reported issues by fixing keyboard unresponsiveness and display image retention. Hopefully, there will be no more bugs.
stories.Tweet: Good news for iPhone users! 📦 Apple's iOS 17.1 (Release Candidate) addresses user-reported issues by fixing keyboard unresponsiveness and display image retention. Hopefully, there will be no more bugs.  #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/10/17/ios-17-1-keyboard-bug-image-retention/

title: Baidu's powerful ERNIE, Nvidia and Foxconn join forces, Browse with Bing is now live
description: ERNIE 4.0 has no reason to envy GPT-4. Baidu's chatbot is stepping up its game in the AI world with some serious multimodal skills. Foxconn and NVIDIA have teamed up to enhance the self-driving experience. "AI factories" are coming. Oh, and after a few weeks of beta testing, you can finally surf the web with Bing on ChatGPT. Time to catch some waves!
